label: 浄瑠璃
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: Musical recitaion, usually accompanied on the shamisen and often heard in the puppet and kabuki theaters. Many subgenres exist: gidayū bushi, tosa bushi, geki bushi, bugyō bushi, handayū bushi, katō bushi, tokiwazu bushi, tomimoto bushi, kiyomoto bushi, shinnai bushi, and others.［義太夫節,土佐節,外記節,奉行節,半太夫節,河東節,常盤津節,富本節,清元節,新内節］
